pageContent: Background: It is challenging to decide in which way we should care for localized prostate cancer. The current guideline can be accepted as an appropriate foundation. However, there are doubts if guideline recommendations are implemented.

metaData.source:
Defeating prostate cancer: crucial directions for research--excerpt from the report of the Prostate Cancer Progress Review Group
https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/9973103/
